name: Pumpkin Log
steps: Beat eggs high speed for 5 minutes with lemon juice.
Mix dry ingredients. Add eggs then pumpkin mix.
Use parchment paper and bake at 15 min. Put powdered sugar on parchment paper and turn roll onto parchment. Roll and freeze for 5-10 minutes, unroll.
Unroll. Put cream cheese mixture on reroll and freeze with Saran Wrap or foil on it. Serve semi-frozen.
